means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 德思 Death的变体

sentence.Network_en: There was a dearth of reliable information on the subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于这个课题缺乏可靠资料。

sentence.Network_en: There is a dearth of good children's plays.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前缺少优秀的儿童剧.

sentence.Network_en: In our dearth of ack - ack guns all sorts of contrivances were used.
sentence.Network_cn: 在缺少高射炮的时候,我们利用了各种各样的巧妙方法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 淡淡的英文单词怎么写？-外语-天涯问答 ... dapple v. （使…）有斑点 dearth n. 饥荒，饥馑 elf n. 淘气鬼，小玩皮.
英语谐音背单词_百度知道 ... corolla  n. 花冠 dearth  n. 缺乏,粮食不足,饥谨 debar   vt. 排除,防止,禁止.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... deaf 聋的；不愿听的 dearth 缺乏，供应不足 debris 碎片，瓦砾堆.
淡淡的英文单词怎么写？-外语-天涯问答 ... dapple v. （使…）有斑点 dearth n. 饥荒，饥馑 elf n. 淘气鬼，小玩皮.

list.abs: 女性缺席,absence of... ... ) men's absence 男性缺席 ) Female dearth 女性缺失.
Incomplete ascension will lead to disease and early dearth ., 不完全的提升将带来疾病和早期死亡.

KJV And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the Spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .[新译]其中有一个名叫亚迦布的站起来，借着圣灵指出天下将要有大饥荒；这事在革老丢时期果然发生了。
A prolonged dearth or shortage ., 长期缺乏或不足.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English derthe (originally in the sense 'shortage and dearness of food')(see dear, -th)

entry.def: If there is a dearth of something, there is not enough of it.

example.ex: ...the dearth of good fiction by English authors.
example.tran: 英国作家写的优秀小说少之又少

auth_sentence.content: The fertility of Egypt supplied the dearth of Arabia.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fertility of Egypt supplied the dearth of Arabia.

auth_sentence.content: There's a dearth of good-looking women guides.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's a dearth of good-looking women guides.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a dearth of good-looking women guides.

auth_sentence.content: Finally, the dollar benefits from a dearth of alternatives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally, the dollar benefits from a dearth of alternatives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Finally, the dollar benefits from a dearth of alternatives.

sentences.en: There is a dearth of good children’s plays.
sentences.cn: 目前缺少优秀的儿童剧。
